author: qizhou
content: I am proposing EIP-5027 to remove contract size limit https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-5027.md and address potential DoS attack without changing Ethereum state. The core idea to charge the gas for contract reading related OPs (e.g., CALL/DELEGATECALL) as that of reading multiple existing contracts, e.g., calling a contract size of 24KB + 1  equals to calling two contracts (2 * 700 gas).

author: qizhou
content: To further prevent DoS attack, the EIP recommends implementation of a mapping of codehash => codesize in client db (not Ethereum account), so that we could pre-charge the gas according to the code size before reading the actual potential-large-size contract.

author: qizhou
content: Reference implementation on Geth is attached, and the code is running in our L2 testnet for about 2 months
